short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension adds an episode list button to select the episode while watching Viaplay series.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Go to the next episode smoothly with Viaplay Episode Selector. No more searching for the series through the home page, no more going back and forth to change the episode. 

This extension improves Viaplay navigation by adding 2 new Netflix-like buttons. Now you’ll be able to go to the next episode straight from the one you're watching or see the episode list and choose one of them.

How to use Viaplay Episode Selector?

1. Add the extension to your Chrome browser.
2. Go to Viaplay and pick a TV show to watch.
3. Navigate to the playback options (at the bottom of the player). You should see 2 new icons next to the volume icon - Next episode and Select Episode.
4. Click on the next episode button to start the next episode. Click on the select episode button to navigate through the episodes. The list will show available episodes.

Entertainment shouldn't be complicated. Enjoy watching your favorite series with easy access to more episodes.
